Summary UX designer / Product owner 
 
After working on various UX methods for last 8 years, I realized that nowadays I am key person collaborating between stakeholders, engineers, management, and mainly users. Analyzing and converting user requirements into wireframes or mockups after convincing stakeholders that this is what users need.Or even sometimes converting stakeholders' ideas into mockups and verify them with users.  
 
Second important thing was setting up the UX in Agile work practices. Even got the taste of UX + product owner role. Generated buzz of UX design and thereby increasing value of UX in the organization.  
 
To achieve above mentioned things I use most of the UCD methods such as user research, persona, contextual inquiry, task analysis, interaction design, wire frames, paper prototyping (whiteboard prototypes), usability testings, focus groups, heuristic evaluation/design reviews, interactive prototyping, and visual design.
